summary: The module provides unit tests for offline feature store retrieval jobs, including a mock retrieval job class that simulates data extraction and offers utilities to convert results into Arrow tables, pandas DataFrames, expose feature metadata, onâ€‘demand feature views, and generate SQL statements. It also contains a basic test verifying SQL generation.
business_intent: Validate that offline store retrieval jobs correctly transform feature data into various formats and produce accurate SQL representations, ensuring reliability across different offline store implementations.
